name: Maddinburg Hills
description:
Rumors surround Maddinburg hills, but are they really what they seem to be?

---------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look around with lantern

Mouse + Hold - Look around

Space / Mouse click - Interact

There's two modes of "looking", one is just moving the mouse which will move the lantern. The other is when you hold down the mouse and drag, which will move the camera.
